"KNOW YOUR GANG"
A program study in juvenile delinquency prevention
which probes into gang structures. Through such
involvement it may be possible to redirect the
activity spectrum of gang membership into more
socially acceptable channels. Gangs are highly
organized segments of our society and affect
substantial numbers of American Youth and young
adult population. Through such programs, gang
members can have the opportunity to look at
themselves and their gang. Through such
programs certain kind^Df tension and fear about
authority, and society, may be reduced.
